Literature.Title: Cephaibols, new peptaibol antibiotics with anthelmintic properties from Acremonium tubakii DSM 12774
Literature.Author: Schiell M, Hofmann J, Kurz M, Schmidt FR, Vértesy L, Vogel M, Wink J, Seibert G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus SG511(MIC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SG511(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Exp54146(MIC=10µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes A561(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium M78L(MIC=20µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>160µg/ml)
